Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $15,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to quality. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
